emailTemplate.subject: ${localSakaiName} Site Notification
emailTemplate.message:
Dear ${userName},
${currentUserName} added you to the following ${localSakaiName} site: ${siteName}
<#if newNonOfficialAccount == "true" > <#if hasNonOfficialAccountUrl == "true" > To get a guest account, follow the steps on ${nonOfficialAccountUrl}
</#if> Once you have your guest account, you can log into ${localSakaiName}:
1. Visit ${localSakaiName}: ${localSakaiURL} 2. In the top right corner of the page, type your guest account user id and password into the login fields, and click the "Log In" button. 3. Once you're logged in, find this site using these steps: a. click the "Sites" link in the top right corner, then b. type the site name in the provided search field 4. Click on the name of the site that appears to visit it
<#else> To log in:
1. Open ${localSakaiName}: ${localSakaiURL} 2. In the top right corner of the page, type your user id and password into the login fields, and click the "Log In" button. 3. Once you're logged in, find this site using these steps: a. click the "Sites" link in the top right corner, then b. type the site name in the provided search field 4. Click on the name of the site that appears to visit it </#if>

emailTemplate.subject: ${localSakaiName} Notificació de lloc
emailTemplate.message:
${userName}: Se us ha afegit al/s següent/s ${localSakaiName} lloc: per ${currentUserDisplayName}. <#if newNonOfficialAccount == "true" >Insert your institutions specific instructions for new guest users here
Quan tingueu el vostre compte de convidat, ja podeu accedir-hi. ${localSakaiName} : 1. Obriu ${localSakaiName} : ${localSakaiURL} 2. Feu clic al botó Entrar. 3. Escriviu el vostre compte d'amic d'inici de sessió i contrasenya, i feu clic a Entrar. <#else >Per entrar: 1. Obriu ${localSakaiName} : ${localSakaiURL} 2. Feu clic al botó Entrar. 3. Escriviu el vostre nom d'usuari i contrasenya i feu clic a Entrar. </#if>4. Aneu al lloc, feu clic a la pestanya del lloc (veureu dues o més pestanyes en una fila a la part superior de la pantalla).

<#if newNonOfficialAccount == "true" >Insert your institutions specific instructions for new guest users here </#if>
